resources.string: You have guessed every word. Do you want to play again?
You lost.. The correct word was
When entering the Game screen, you will see underlines which represents the word you are trying to guess.
Take a guess by clicking on a letter. If the letter exists, it will show up on all possible places in the \'invisible\' word.
Each time you guess a letter, it becomes green if the letter is correct and red if not.
If the letter is wrong, the hangman will increment and you will be one step closer to losing.
The hangman will be incremented in the following order: head, body, arm, arm, leg, leg and dead.
Wins represents every correct word guessed.\nLosses represents every wrong word guessed.
